collection:
This Privacy Policy document
contains types of information that is collected and recorded by YT Video
Summarizer and how we use it.

YT Video Summarizer legal basis for collecting and using the personal
information described in this Privacy Policy depends on the Personal
Information we collect and the specific context in which we collect the
information:

  * YT Video Summarizer needs to perform a contract with you
  * You have given YT Video Summarizer permission to do so
  * Processing your personal information is in YT Video Summarizer legitimate interests 
  * YT Video Summarizer needs to comply with the law

YT Video Summarizer will retain your personal information only for as long as
is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

The information collected by log files
include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service
Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the
number of clicks.
They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.

YT Video Summarizer does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable
Information from children under the age of 13.

## Online Privacy Policy Only

Our Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for
visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared
and/or collect in YT Video Summarizer.

This policy is not applicable to any
information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
